# bcftools

## Extract region and write a vcf.gz

 ```bash
/home/seb/tools/bcftools-1.3.1/bcftools view -r 19:1-20500000 <file.vcf.gz> -o <out.vcf.gz> -Oz
```

## Extract SNPS from imputed files

 ```bash
for f in *.dose.vcf.gz
do
        bcftools view -H -r 1:55496039,1:56962821,1:109822166,1:154422067,1:222823529,2:21286057,2:44073881,2:85809989,2:145801461,2:203745885,3:138122122,4:148393664,4:156635309,5:131667353,6:12927544,6:35034800,6:39174922,6:134214525,6:160863532,6:160961137,6:161010118,6:161143608,7:19036775,7:107244545,7:129663496,8:126490972,9:22003223,9:22098574,9:136154168,10:30335122,10:44539913,10:44753867,10:91005854,10:104719096,11:103660567,11:116648917,12:111884608,12:121435587,13:28973621,13:110960712,13:111049623,14:100133942,15:79089111,15:79141784,15:91416550,17:2126504,17:17543722,17:46988597,19:11163601,21:35599128 $f >> snps.txt
done
```
